posts.title: Ahoy!
posts.text: Nameâ€™s K4LM3D. Iâ€™m right here at our headquarters, recycling some items into scraps. Nothing special, just wanna share my journey and my friendsâ€™ at one of the busiest cities in the continent with yâ€™all. Thatâ€™s it for now guys. Needed to go for some gang duties.

posts.title: [BUN] Is Gone
posts.text: 5 years worth of upkeep is all gone! ğŸ˜• Our gang leader, krolik, deleted his account yesterday. He forgot to transfer the leadership to BasedBunny before deleting it. This causes our gang, CyBunnies [BUN] to dissolved. DexterHuang, the developer said that we can create a new one but he can only restore the level, not everything (resources, funds, members). Right now, some of us hopped to other gangs temporarily, while the rest (including me) were tagless (not part of any gang). Originally posted at GamerProfiles.com (some details are changed/added)

posts.title: Log #2
posts.text: I told one of my friends that I would be in a gang with him. But I changed my mind later on as I realized that I do not want to rely that much on anyone ever again, even to a friend. So I started my own gang. I named it â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ [â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ]. I was doing very well all by myself. Yesterday, I renamed it to â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ [â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ]. And then I met a stranger who later told me that he wanted to join my gang. I donâ€™t really know what I should do. Before we met, my mind was a bit messed up. I didnâ€™t get much sleep because of farming and the thoughts of joining my friendsâ€™ gang also often come through my mind. But I donâ€™t know whyâ€¦ I feel like I was in front of a mirror. A novice just like me before was in front of me now. I feel like I wanted to help him out so I welcomed him in.

posts.title: Log #1
posts.text: I remembered how they invited me to join their gang and welcomed me so happily. I was a novice with no friends back then so I was really glad to talk to them. Something came up to me after that and I wasnâ€™t able to meet them. After two days without contact, I rode a train and went to the headquarters to meet them again. I was so happy until in an instant, everything has changed. The other people left for the other gang. The leaders encouraged me to stay so I stayed with the other members. I couldnâ€™t hide my sadness in front of them, but I just accepted it. I went to the headquarters everyday. It slowly went empty but was full of silence. A couple of days later, I finally met them again. They said that I was doing great with grinding. I was so happy when hear that. No, I was happy to meet them. But it happened againâ€¦ After gladness comes sorrow. They advised me to join my former gang mates who went to the other gang, a grandiose clan. I put on a fake smile. I donâ€™t want it. I said to myself that even though our gangâ€™s not that active, I love it and I donâ€™t want to leave the headquarters but I was hurt that they wanted me to do that so I said good bye to them instead. They said that they felt bad and were sorry. I asked them to not feel that way and I walked out. I missed the recycler inside the headquarters and of course, my mates. But after a few days of enjoying being alone, I can now feel the freedom from the pain I have inside. I met them again once while looting and they gave gifts to me. I felt bad not joining them but I still went on my own journey. I traveled by a train around the city finding loot. I met new people and they became very close to my heart in a very short period of time. They leave their gangs and create a new one together. I canâ€™t believe that they can leave their respected gangs so easily. They are fun to be with. I wanted to be with them too but I canâ€™t be in a gang yet. I promised them Iâ€™d join them when Iâ€™m ready. But when I was finally ready to join them, it was too late. We later parted ways. Itâ€™s okay because we still see each other every day and promised to have each otherâ€™s backs. I celebrated holidays with them. They became my precious friends. I still have contact with my previous gangmates because we still trade items and weâ€™re all on good terms. Now, Iâ€™m building my own gang. It was so peaceful.

posts.title: Log #3
posts.text: After that night, I did not see â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ again. I messaged him, and he responded two or three days later. He explained that he couldnâ€™t come since he was too busy with his academics. I told him that it was fine because his studies were more important. He promised to try whenever he had free time, but that day never came. One day, I came upon an advertisement on a public server concerning â€œthe future of Shangri-Laâ€. I joined their private server out of curiousity. After being greeted by their counselor, I met their commander a few days later. He assisted me in creating files on the server. They have several monetary systems and such. The commander told me that in order to continue on their server and secure Shangri-Laâ€™s future, I needed to join a strong gang. Then, I remembered having met someone a long time ago. She leads a vast gang. Iâ€™m not sure if theyâ€™re powerful, but sheâ€™s also on the private server. I recognized her username, so I contacted her. I explained everything and she warmly welcomed me to the gang. Then I discovered that her gang was quite kind and loved to â€œhelp other peopleâ€. Iâ€™m happy that I joined her gang since my worries began to fade after that day. I will talk about those worries later. Back on the private server, there are four factions. Iâ€™m not going to list them all. Iâ€™ll only post about the faction that I joined. So I joined the faction called â€œâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ€. They are mostly from â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ District and are all people in business. As a member, I am required to work for three hours at â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Bank. The rate is acceptable, and I can eat one of my favorite foods, pork adobo, at a nearby restaurant. Wait, I forgot I had to change my backpack. Sorry, but I have to leave to recycle tech scraps now. â€˜Till next time.

posts.title: Pointless and Tagless
posts.text: Finding My Way BackAfter my last post 3 years ago, I tried to keep up with this log series, but Iâ€™ll be honest: staying motivated has been a struggle. Iâ€™ve found myself asking, â€œWhy am I doing this? Whatâ€™s the purpose?â€ I keep reminding myself that these logs are meant to document my journey in CyberCode Online, but real-life responsibilities keep pulling me away. Thereâ€™s a constant voice in my head telling me I should be focusing on â€œother thingsâ€ instead. I even finished a 4th log last year, but I left it in my drafts; at the time, it just didnâ€™t feel like there was any point in hitting publish. A Long HiatusI was on and off with CCO throughout last year. I played until about July 2025, but after reaching out to my friend En_Roise when she returned, I ended up taking another long break. Reconnecting with the CommunityThings changed on December 24th. My twin brother, Chief_Marauder, invited me to Chiimâ€™s Discord server, which aims to gather all the Filipino players from CCO. I decided to join, and to my surprise, I won a giveaway on the 30th! I logged back into the game the next day to claim my prize. The End of an EraWhen I met up with Chief_Marauder to receive the prize, I noticed he was wearing the [RAT] tag. When I asked if he had switched gangs, he gave me the bad news: CyBunnies [BUN] has been dissolved. I hadnâ€™t even realized I was tagless until that moment. After he caught me up on everything that happened, I shared a post about it. 5 years worth of upkeep is all gone! ğŸ˜• Our gang leader, krolik, deleted his account yesterday. He forgot to transfer the leadership to BasedBunny before deleting it. This causes our gang, CyBunnies [BUN] to dissolved. DexterHuang, the developer said that we can create a new one but he can only restore the level, not everything (resources, funds, members). Right now, some of us hopped to other gangs temporarily, while the rest (including me) were tagless (no gang). Originally posted on (GamerProfiles) Moving ForwardIâ€™ve been planning to write an update on my CCO journey since last year, but I kept procrastinating. Today, I finally decided it was time to just sit down and do it. As for whatâ€™s next, Chief_Marauder recently joined Meows_Cafe [8_8], along with Chiim and several others. Theyâ€™ve invited me to join them, but for now, Iâ€™m remaining tagless. Iâ€™ve been thinking about joining Nousagi [NSG], but Iâ€™m still waiting to hear back from En_Roise before I make a final decision. Iâ€™m still searching for that sparkâ€”the reason to keep documenting this journey. For now, Iâ€™m just taking it one step at a time. I hope that as I continue to hang around the community, Iâ€™ll eventually find the purpose Iâ€™m looking for. I hope youâ€™ll stick around and wish me luck in finding it.

pages.title: CyberCode Online
pages.text: CyberCode Online is a text-based MMORPG inspired by the Cyberpunk theme ğŸˆ Level up your character by clearing random dungeons ğŸ’‘ Co-op with real players to defeat dungeon and bosses in Real-Time ğŸ’¬ Global chat available with a helpful and friendly community ğŸ’° Real-time player market for you to trade and earn Credit: CyberCode Online - Official game in Microsoft Storeâ€™s Description Notice: This is not sponsored but an act of appreciation to the games that makes me forget about reality for just a moment.

pages.title: About
pages.text: Hi, I am K4LM3D /ka:md/On this post, you will learn about me and the things I do at one of my favorite online game, CyberCode Online (CCO). Information in this post are frequently changed or updated so check this post again for updates ğŸ—º My go to places: âš“ Standby and talks a lot at CCOâ€™s Tagalog channel ğŸ“£ Always waiting at #events and #giveaways channels on CCOâ€™s Official Discord Server ğŸ”­ Currently working onâ€¦ ğŸ’ Crafting my Autonomous Storage Unit (ASU) backpack ğŸ›’ Selling some of my old weapons and gears. (help other players)!â€—krolik [BUN] âš¡ Fun facts: â˜• I need cups of coffee not pain awaysâ„¢ to heal ğŸ’­ I think a lot thatâ€™s why I wear a ro-bunny suit created with DELL-Eâ€˜s technology to relax ğŸ¤« TMIs: ğŸ‘¤ My nickname, Kal, is given to me by my CCO best friends, Chief_Marauder & Ain_sel, and we have a group chat called ChAin3D on Discord ğŸš© Nousagi [NSE] gang is basically the (un)official Tagalog channelâ€™s gang! ğŸ¤™ Hommies: SickPanel [0_O] (my kawan), Slwny [GIO] (2nd kawan) ğŸ¤— More best friends: SkaE_17 and En_Roise of Nousagi [NSG], ZeaZ of Elysian [EYN] ğŸ¦œ En_Roise, ZeaZ, Chief_Marauder and me have a different group chat called C4ZE with out Arclight City profiles on Discord ğŸ¤ R.I.P.: King_of_kings (the real one, his best friend uses his account now) ğŸˆ More friends**: Punxi and GrimTalker of CyberPyschos [0_O], Khaelent, Nyxll, RSTwinBlade, dreyyy [TOT], Juso DexterHuang [DEV]: CyberCode OnlineKhaelent [0_O]: CyberChat Online ğŸ’¬ Ask me aboutâ€¦ How to play CCO?
